descriptionHtml:
Requires Dawnguard!

first i need to thank 

Liliths Obliterator - Custom Battleaxes, Waraxes and Maces 3.0

Overlord Armor & Dungeon boss

for the awesome meshes on the armor and weapon
i think i did a totaly good job with this mod

WARNING! if you got previus versions it could be that the game will crash on load PLZ deinstall my mod make a save without my mod and install again = will work

About the mod:

In whiterun on the grey mane house  (what will be destroyed later, first house left side from marked) is a  new door that leads into a small room with an surprise i bet you will not survive it =)
but if you manage you will get the armor the weapon and 2 spell tomes
the spell tomes allow you to summon up to 20 goblins!
they follow you in a little crowd (somethimes they need a bit to follow because of custom ai packages)
ive added male goblins that use mele weapons dualwielded and female goblins that use bows
the second spell tome allows you to kill them when you point at them (spells where alot of work)

Update!!
Newspelltome send Goblins Makes them search for armor and weapons and pick up the best choice and drop the old/bader ones
Update!!
when goblins die they give theyr inventory to the player and starting with nothing
Update!!
added now a completly new spell tome that contains all spells can be found on the table in the room
added now different spells for different goblins
add healer and mage goblins
Update!!!
Fixed death goblins teleport
Fixed main gate teleport problems!!
Big update!!
I changed the way they spawn now there are 80 unique goblins (was needet to let them keep stuff when teleport LOTS OF WORK thanks to Black RL)
lots of bug fixing i only know 1 existing bug somethimes it can happen that when they drop items they can drop tru the ground but happens realy not often

if you see any bug plz tell me!!

If you like endorse =)



Realy much thanks For the Teleport to playerscript when reach distance and the help for the pick up script To Black RL Realy love what you did
author: AluCard
